title: I cannot find the region change option
body:
After moving oversea I decided that I wanted to change my account to North American server. I purchased RP to change buy a region change. However, after log in and going into the shop (under the account section), I could not find an option to purchase a region change. I thought it was a bug due to the fact that I am oversea so I asked my friend (he lives in Australia; part of the Oceania Network) to help. The result was that he could not find anything either. 
Please help, Kami

replies.body: Hey there, transfers are currently on [cooldown](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown).  They will be unavailable until November as we ramp up for the end of the season.
